heading: HB06119
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE NATIONAL ELECTRONIC TOLL COLLECTION SYSTEM FOR ALL EXPRESSWAYS IN THE COUNTRY
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2020-02-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06119
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE NATIONAL ELECTRONIC TOLL COLLECTION SYSTEM FOR ALL EXPRESSWAYS IN THE COUNTRY
ABSTRACT : Seeks to establish the interoperability of existing toll operations between different expressways to harness the full potential of providing fast, seamless and convenient means of land transportation. Defines several terms among others such as Electronic Toll Interoperability which refers to a system where an electronic or R F I D tag from one toll road operator can be used in the toll road of another operator, or a single electronic of R F I D tag can be used to access all toll roads in the country. Also refers Radio Frequency Identification or R F I D to a technology whereby digital data encoded in R F I D tags or labels are automatically identified, collected and entered into computer systems with little or no human intervention.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GATCHALIAN, WESLIE T.
DATE FILED : 2020-01-29
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Barba (000 2020-02-10)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
